It said somewhere or other that the gaps are for where they were leaving 
space for future scenarios. The jump between missions and tutorials was 
obviously in case they wanted yto add more mission, and individual gaps are 
where they were leaving the possibility for more scenarios relating to the 
topic of those missions.
